value_claims.claim_title: 8% staff adoption within two months of Edison platform rollout
value_claims.claim_description: Within two months of deploying the Edison AI platform, 8% of BKW staff were actively using the system, establishing a foundation for ongoing AI expansion.
value_claims.source_quote: Within two months of roll-out, 8% of staff were already actively using Edison, so a foundation has been laid for the ongoing expansion of AI, with more than 40 potential use cases documented.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The Edison platform directly enabled staff adoption through its AI-powered semantic search and generative AI capabilities.

value_claims.claim_description: The Edison platform enabled BKW to process media inquiries 50% faster by leveraging Azure AI Foundry and Azure OpenAI services for internal data access.
value_claims.source_quote: BKW developed Edison, a platform using Microsoft Azure, Azure AI Foundry, and Azure OpenAI services, to securely and effectively tap into internal data. Within two months of its roll-out, 8% of staff were actively using Edison, media inquiries were processed 50% faster, and more than 40 use cases were documented.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The 50% speed improvement is directly attributed to the Edison platform's AI capabilities for accessing and analyzing internal data.

value_claims.claim_title: Secure and scalable AI embedding across organization
value_claims.claim_description: BKW successfully embedded AI systematically using the Edison platform built on Azure, enabling secure access to internal data and responsible staff introduction to AI technologies.

value_claims.attribution_evidence: The Edison platform directly provided the secure, scalable infrastructure needed for systematic AI embedding.
